resources.string: Send a request. Your chaplain will reply as soon as possible.

A QR code is a type of matrix barcode first designed in 1994 for the automotive industry in Japan. A barcode is a machine-readable optical label that contains information about the item to which it is attached
Welcome, if you have unread requests, kindly APPROVE or DECLINE.
Add a new week to scan students Quick Response code
Click on float button to scan student Quick Response code
Display your QR CODE to get scanned.
